title: Spaghetti Squash and Feta Cheese Casserole

instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place squash face down in a baking pan; pour in water to 1/2 inch.
instructions.2: Bake in the preheated oven until interior can be easily pierced with a fork, about 1 hour. Cool until easily handled, about 15 minutes.
instructions.3: Scrape squash flesh into spaghetti strands with a spoon; place into a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
instructions.4: Spread squash, tomatoes, onion, feta cheese, spinach, and spaghetti sauce in 3 even layers in a casserole dish. Top with Parmesan cheese.
instructions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until Parmesan cheese is melted and bubbly, 30 minutes to 1 hour.
